short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze articles for political bias ratings with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using state-of-the-art Artifical Intelligence systems, Politica allows for instant bias, factuality, and trustworthiness ratings on millions of articles.

* Get personalized insights based on articles' content, analyzed using world-class AI models.
* Our extension works on millions of articles, accessible at the click of a button.
* Reasoning for bias ratings is automatically generated by AI, giving support for its analysis.
